findings.title: Compiler version issue
findings.description: The compiler version for the Liquidity contract is ^0.5.0 which may cause confusion on the solidity version of the file while deploying the contract.

findings.title: DocstringParsingError: Documented parameter not found in the parameter list of the function
findings.description: The natspecs should be updated as suggested to include parameters 'name_' in the parameter list of the function.

findings.title: Compiler Version Security
findings.description: Using an old compiler version prevents access to new Solidity security checks.

findings.title: Gas Consumption
findings.description: The contract uses a for loop in the _calculate() function which can cause gas consumption to exceed the block gas limit, potentially stalling the contract.

findings.title: Block Properties Dependence
findings.description: The contract uses block.timestamp at various places. Be aware that the timestamp of the block can be manipulated by the miner, and all direct and indirect uses of the timestamp should be considered.
